description:
# Create a Shipper
A Shipper is the person or company responsible for sending the cargo in a sea freight transaction.

In ERPNext, the Shipper record includes complete business details such as name, address, contact info, tax identification, and shipping instructions. It is a required party in every sea freight booking and is often linked to consignees, agents, and documentation like the Bill of Lading.
name: Create Shipper
title: Create Shipper
